CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(qtc_Bill_To_Site__c),'', qtc_Bill_To_Site__r.BillingStreet & BR() & qtc_Bill_To_Site__r.BillingCity & ","& " " & qtc_Bill_To_Site__r.BillingState & " " & qtc_Bill_To_Site__r.BillingPostalCode & BR() & qtc_Bill_To_Site__r.BillingCountry )
CustomField.label: Bill To Site Address
